messages.title: How we can change the future together
messages.content: Control our borders, Invest in the NHS, Fairer tax system, Spend here, not abroad.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pour in £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55-million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the 'bedroom tax', and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the 30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

issues.brexitEurope: By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the 30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.
issues.economy: UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the 'bedroom tax', and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
issues.health: UKIP will pour in £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55-million a day EU membership fee.
issues.immigration: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.

leaflet.additionalNotes: UKIP will vote to freeze Council Tax; Campaign to scrap hospital parking fees; Make the council accountable; promote the 'green' system; Let you vote on large developments; Demand a free daytime parking period in the city centre; Properly control taxi licensing and numbers; Support the return of Worcester City FC; Do more to discourage dog fouling/littering.
